data.name: Hazard Ops: Bad Santa Pack
data.detailed_description:
What a feast before Christmas! A true slaughtering spree is awaiting you, and our popular Bad Santa is who we are focusing on. You better watch out cos he’s doing what he does best: Unpacking weapons and scattering some “presents” among the bad kids.

Get into the right Christmas mood by putting on the Christmas costume and grabbing the awesome Snowball Gun. And if there are actually opponents left after you’ve unleashed a snowy hell on them, you can always give them something sweet to chew on with the Candy Cane.

Our own Bad Santas are obviously the best there are in the North, and they bring a whole slew of Turrets, Coin Boosts and XP Boosts.

Weapons

  • Snowball Gun (Permanent)
  • Candy Cane (Permanent) – Free on top!

Costumes

  • Bad Santa (M) (Permanent)
  • Santa’s Helper (F) (Permanent)

ID Card

  • Yuletide ID Card (Permanent)

Tech

  • Speed Lord (30 days)

Items and Turrets

  • 1x Jingle Bells (65% more XP for 1 day)
  • 1x Coin Boost (65% more Coins for 1 day)
  • 10x Revive Token
  • 5x Cyclone Turret
  • 5x Grenade Turret
  • 5x Lightning Turret

data.short_description: Tough, tougher, Bad Santa. Christmas is the best time for a few well-placed ass kicks. And who would be better suited than out most favorite wearer of boots? This pack contains everything a really bad-ass Santa needs!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 7600GT (must support Shader Model 3.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, Core 2 Quad, i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT240 or newer (equals Radeon 3650 series)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
